projects.title: XCrypto
projects.description: The Bitcoin Portfolio Tracker is a React-based web application that allows users to monitor and manage their Bitcoin holdings in real-time. The app connects to live Bitcoin price feeds via cryptocurrency APIs.

projects.title: CountriesData
projects.description: This React project allows users to explore a comprehensive list of countries by fetching real-time data from an external API. The application includes so many features like Axios,React-Router-Dom, searching,sorting to enhance the user experience.

projects.title: Sidcup_Golf_House
projects.description: It's Sidcup's Golf Club House Frontend Website which has micro animations and scrolling animations. It is desktop based project which uses GSAP features.

projects.title: Weather_WebApp
projects.description: User-friendly web application built with React that allows users to get real-time weather updates for any location in the world. It includes Weather information like temperature, humidity, wind speed, and forecasts.

projects.title: React_Todo
projects.description: To-do list application built using React that allows users to manage data efficiently. The app integrates with a RESTful API using Axios for fetching data and performs full CRUD.

projects.title: Rejouice
projects.description: It's a Frontend Website which has micro animations and scrolling animations. It is desktop based project which uses GSAP features.
